titleStmt.title: A discourse concerning the worship of the Blessed Virgin and the saints with an account of the beginnings and rise of it amongst Christians, in answer to M. de Meaux's appeal to the fourth age, in his Exposition and pastoral letter.
titleStmt.author: Clagett, William, 1646-1688.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Tho. Bassett ... and Tho. Newborough ...,
